body:
We are building the best NBA Predictions resource on the planet.

One of our partners is an elite statitician that has been beating the NBA for over ten years. He's sharing part of his model.

He can't give us the whole turkey. He's gotta eat too. But the main is breaking off a couple of confit legs and they'll be enough meat on the bone to find an edge.

So bookmark this page and come back before your daily bets. 

- - -

## **Today's NBA Predictions**

Excuse the raw formatting.

We'll have these automated and pretty within the first few weeks of January.

title: NBA Predictions: Find Your Edge With Our Daily NBA Model
